answers.answer: Endocrinologist and a neurologist.Nerve damage usually burns like that. With the absence of rashes, infections, you need to have it checked.Endocrinology for diabetes testing etc.,...good luck

question: I HAVE HAD AN ENDOSCOPY AND MY STOMACH IS INFLAMED NO ULCER.  PILLS WORKED FOR A WHILE BUT STOMACH STILL BURNS NOW MY PENIS BURNS AND MY LEFT ARM SOMETIMES MY FEET.  I NEED TO KNOW WHAT I AM LOOKING AT AND WHICH DOCTOR DO I ATTEND
title: WHICH DOCTOR DO WE SEE/NEED HELP
